create schema Product;

CREATE COLUMN TABLE "PRODUCT"."Categories"(
	"Id" INTEGER GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
	"CategoryName" NVARCHAR(15),
	PRIMARY KEY (
		"Id"
	)
)
UNLOAD PRIORITY 5 AUTO MERGE;


insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Beverages');
insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Condiments');
insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Confections');
insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Dairy Products');
insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Grains/Cereals');
insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Meat/Poultry');
insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Produce');
insert into "PRODUCT"."Categories" ("CategoryName") values('Seafood');
